content.raw: @{5ce2e28709c5fa0fd9fb0c6c} , could you fix the conflicts when you have a chance and create the flag to enable/disable it? Based on the updated numbers and the offline discussion, I’m changing my mind and I’m leaning towards disabling the floating dock in favor of the static approach. The main reason is that my computer is quite decent and I’m not using any controller. The controller will always add some extra load to the system. As usual, other opinions are welcome.
content.html: @Marshall Rawson , could you fix the conflicts when you have a chance and create the flag to enable/disable it? Based on the updated numbers and the offline discussion, I’m changing my mind and I’m leaning towards disabling the floating dock in favor of the static approach. The main reason is that my computer is quite decent and I’m not using any controller. The controller will always add some extra load to the system. As usual, other opinions are welcome.
